Description: Available 9/1! Here's your chance for an affordable apartment in the Historic North End! Open concept studio right off Salem & Commercial street on a quiet, 1 way street. This unit features hardwood flooring, eat in kitchen, newer gas stove & fridge. Just steps to all of the finest dining & entertainment in Boston, and a very easy commute to West End, Financial District, Waterfront, & beyond (Haymarket Station on the Green Line, Orange Line and North Station on the Green Line, Orange Line, Commuter Rail). Rent includes gas, tenant to pay for heat (electric). No pets, no students, no exceptions. Images are from previous tenancy, apartment is being delivered unfurnished.
